translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter about Rag-robes
“When the Lord of the World had passed away,
and made an offering to the relics.
I made an offering to the relics,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of making an offering to the relics.
I have done what the Awakened One taught.
I have done what the Awakened One taught.”🔽Thus the elder Dhātupūjaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā dhātupūjako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Dhātupūjakattherassāpadānaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
